can.message:
In the ocean it will take up to 200 years for an aluminum can to decompose. 

Select the Trash-magnet to clean up the ocean!

treeFacts: One large tree can supply a day's supply of oxygen for four people.
Over the course its life, a single tree can absorb one ton of carbon dioxide.
Trees properly placed around buildings can reduce air conditioning needs by 30%
Trees are the longest living organisms on Earth, and never die of old age.
Trees lower air temperature by evaporating water in their leaves.
trashFacts: Plastic is the most common element that is found in the ocean.
Over one million seabirds are killed by ocean pollution each year
There is an island of garbage twice the size of Texas inside the Pacific Ocean
In the ocean, there is more plastic than fish.
Approximately one truckload of plastic enters the ocean every single minute.
